name: sveltekit-discriminated-fields
description: Type-safe discriminated union support for SvelteKit form fields

scripts.test:runtime: npm run build && tsc -p test/runtime/tsconfig.json && npx tsx test/runtime/has.test.ts
scripts.test: npm run test:types && npm run test:runtime
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build

author: robertadamsonsmith
